title: MS AccessDate()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessDate()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the current system date:
SELECT CustomerName, Date() AS CurrentDate
FROM Customers;

Definition and Usage
The Date() function returns the current system date.
Syntax
Date()
Parameter Values
None.
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessDate()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessDate()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessDate()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
